note.p: Farmer. Son of George Harrison, farmer, of Great Oxendon, Northamptonshire; farmed in West Lexham, Norfolk.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/2252/59/16), 1871 (RG10/1848/81/11), 1881 (RG11/1981/73/9)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.co.uk, accessed 3 October 2019)
